participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.personality: Competitive and focused, but also caring and supportive.
participant_1.background: i am married to a doctor. my family is continuously growing. i am a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and optimistic, with a passion for family and storytelling.
participant_2.background: i'm a baby delivery nurse. i walk three miles every day. my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i love to spend time with my family.
